content.rendered:
Bilingual Customer Recruiter | Tulsa, OK Need Bilingual Customer Recruiter for well-known insurance company Bilingual Customer Recruiter Preferences:
  • Self-starter, reliable, influential person
  • Eager to learn the insurance industry
  • Patience and consistency with potential customers
Bilingual Customer Recruiter Requirements:
  • Experience in excel, word and windows
  • 3 years computer skills
  • Associates degree
  • Fluent in Spanish
